scripts.prepare-mobile: mkdirp dist/mobile/www && ncp build dist/mobile/www && ncp resources/cordova dist/mobile
scripts.package-mobile: npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cordova build && cd ../..
scripts.package-mobile-ios: npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare ios && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cordova build && cd ../..
scripts.package-mobile-android: npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare android && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cordova build && cd ../..
scripts.package-mobile-windows: npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare windows && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cordova build && cd ../..
scripts.build-mobile: npm run build && npm run package-mobile
scripts.build-mobile-ios: npm run build && npm run package-mobile-ios
scripts.build-mobile-android: npm run build && npm run package-mobile-android
scripts.build-mobile-windows: npm run build && npm run package-mobile-windows
scripts.prod-mobile: npm run build-prod && npm run package-mobile
scripts.prod-mobile-ios: npm run build-prod && npm run package-mobile-ios
scripts.prod-mobile-android: npm run build-prod && npm run package-mobile-android
scripts.prod-mobile-windows: npm run build-prod && npm run package-mobile-windows
